title: 35309 Michelle Dr - Unit 217
posting_body: Michelle Place Apartments is a great place to call home.
Your NEW Home is a LARGE 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment.
This very spacious 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment is loaded with all the conveniences you will ever need; gas stove, frost free refrigerator, and an abundance of closet space.
There is also additional storage in the basement (10 X 10 basement storage area), and laundry on site.
This small, cozy community is located just off I-94 and Wayne Rd.
Your new home will be just minutes from x-ways, eateries, entertainment, & parks.
For your convenience the bus line is right outside your door.
This apartment has everything, but you!
If you make 3 times the rent, have a good rental history and credit, this is the place for you.
I can't wait to help you make Michele Place Apartments your new home!
